attributes.action: Equip the current Police Force with swords that are also tasers.
attributes.additional_details: This is why I propose we properly arm our police. Not with guns but with swords. The reasoning for this request is simple. Guns are a poor choice. They can easily inflict mortal wounds on targets I imagine in implementing guns we would be faced by many of the media out-cries the U.S.A faces. So I propose a more elegant solution. Sword tasers. The sword gives you ample range on any knife wielder and the taser allows you to easily incapacitate your foes.
attributes.background: We live in troubled times. Tyranny and terrorism run rampant. Our Police force stand against this threat but are significantly under equipped. I understand that they are a disciplined and well trained force but there is only so much one person can do when faced by an assailant with a knife.

rejection.details: This would be an operational decision for the police and not the UK Government or Parliament.
